metadata.title: CVE-2014-5274 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the view operations page in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.3 and 4.2.x before 4.2.7.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted view name, related to js/functions.js.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.7.1-1').
